sentences.sContent: To mouse proof your house, check all small openings with a ballpoint pen - if it fits the hole, it will let mice in.
sentences.sContent_eng: To mouse proof your house, check all small openings with a ballpoint pen - if it fits the hole, it will let mice in.
sentences.sCn: 要使你的房子里没有小老鼠，用圆珠笔来检查下所有的小洞，如果圆珠笔能放进去的话，那小老鼠就可能钻进去。

sentences.sContent: If you twist the shaft in one way it becomes a ballpoint pen.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you twist the shaft in one way it becomes a ballpoint pen.
sentences.sCn: 如果你以某种方式转动笔杆，它就变成了一支圆珠笔。

sentences.sContent: Laptop, flash disk, a ballpoint pen, a pencil, a notebook, a pair of glasses, cell phone, charger, moisture lotion, … Oh, that is too much.
sentences.sContent_eng: Laptop, flash disk, a ballpoint pen, a pencil, a notebook, a pair of glasses, cell phone, charger, moisture lotion, … Oh, that is too much.
sentences.sCn: 笔记本电脑，闪存，一致圆珠笔，一支钢笔，一本笔记本，一副眼镜，手机，保湿液，… 噢，太多了。

trans.tranOther: a pen with a ball at the end that rolls ink onto the paper
